name: Kraken
description: Kraken is a program allowing to create an infrastructure for fully scalable on-demand game servers. Kraken is still in the test phase, it is currently deployed on 2 large minecraft game server platforms, it currently manages to manage more than 900 instances at a time. This personal project took me around 5 months to complete, now my goal for this one is to integrate cloud platform management (AWS, Scalway..).

name: Kasa
description: Kasa is a study project where we had to create a housing rental site from a model. This project allowed me to learn the big basics of react such as props, dynamic components.. This project was carried out in about 3 full days (72h) of work including learning react. The project then allowed me to start personal and professional creations using the react framework.

name: Mon Vieux Grimoire
description: MonVieuxGrimoire is a study project where we had to create the back-end of a book rating site. This project allowed me to learn the basics of Express and OWASP. This project was carried out in about 5 full days of work including learning Express and different technologies associated with the project. The project then allowed me to start personal and professional creations using the express framework.
